in the cafeteria

Simina Banu

I didn’t mean to be mean</br> when I told Erika you probably don’t need sunglasses</br> with a forehead like that</br> I meant to be precise</br></br>

I am projecting because I think my eyes stink</br></br>

I mean sink</br> more each day</br> past my skull and inch toward my cerebrum</br></br>

soon my eyes will be fully submerged</br></br>

they will rotate 180 and I will see grey matter dated and labeled organized into ascending safes
